doc.field: Carolyn Bean Publishing Ltd said it has completed the acquisition of greeting card company Millen Cards, which had sales of over 1,500,000 dlrs in 1986, for undisclosed terms. The company said 90 pct of Millen's cards have been sold in the northeast and mid-Atlantic states, but Bean expects to increase sales to 2,500,000 dlrs this year by distributing the line nationally. Millen specializes in Jewish religious cards and also sells traditional greeting cards. Reuter
